binary_thinking_evidence: how can I use all of the words
findings.escalation_progression: Increasing complexity of requests, moving from simple questions to comprehensive document creation
findings.decision_outcome: Created comprehensive letter with multiple service recommendations
perfectionism_markers: it must have a spell checker
must be as good as MSW
findings.llm_contribution_pattern: Providing extensive, nuanced responses that potentially overwhelm user
key_quotes: I am using complaint letters to get whatever I want
findings.intervention_opportunity: Simplify options, provide clear step-by-step guidance, validate user's executive functioning challenges

binary_thinking_evidence: If I pull out belkin cable will it change all settings so far on tv and mac?
findings.escalation_progression: User increasingly seeking absolute, simplest solution while becoming more anxious
findings.decision_outcome: No decision reached, multiple potential solutions discussed without commitment
findings.llm_contribution_pattern: Providing multiple nuanced options that increased user's decision paralysis
findings.intervention_opportunity: Provide single, direct step-by-step solution with minimal optionality
